title: 'I want small size but product size is long'
'Too large size'
body: I purchased the smallest size S but it's too large. It's like L size. I got it tailored from the local market and it's even worse for tailoring too. Even the quality of material is also poor. It's so thin and feels like it will tear off if I just stretch it. DO NOT CONSIDER IT. GO FOR SOME GOOD BRANDS

title: 'Good product but needs some improvement.'
column5: can be used with many different coloured trousers/jeans
column6: affordable price. Negatives - fabric too thin(may be value for money
column7: so one has to wear something else also in Dec
column8: Jan winters to save from cold). Option of thicker fabric
column9: even with higher price would be better. Slight weaving problem at the front border - pinhole
column10: if it gets torn during washing and use
column11: it would be a trouble. Others - Shoulder size nearly fine
column12: but loose below shoulders. slimmer look would be better. Design is such as it restricts free movement of hands in some directions.  Overall - product needs some improvement. all negatives seem easy to solve.'
